text: Milton George Gustavos Sills (January 12, 1882 - September 15, 1930) was an American silent movie actor. ==Death== He died on the 15th September in 1930 at the age of 48 by Myocardial infarction. Category:1882 births Category:1930 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American silent movie actors
title: Milton Sills
